name: article-content
title: Article Content
oneLiner: Full article content renderer with highlighting support

apiDoc.name: ArticleContent
apiDoc.description: Full article content renderer with markdown formatting, text selection highlighting support, and floating avatars for highlights. Allows users to select text and create Nostr highlights, displays existing highlights with author avatars, and supports custom content renderers. Features prose typography with responsive headings, lists, blockquotes, and code blocks.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: renderer
props.description: Custom content renderer (uses context or default if not provided)

props.name: highlightFilter
props.description: Filter function to determine which highlights to display

props.name: onHighlightClick
props.description: Callback when a highlight is clicked
